value.0:
Welcome to the World of Sanctuary

When you enter the game for the first time, READ ALL the entries in your journal. Then proceed to the NPC named Guide to Diablo Lord of Destruction. Read the background information but more importantly read the information about the waypoint system. THIS IS CRUCIAL !
Next proceed to the NPC Akara and talk to her, she will get you started on the first quest.

Things you SHOULD DO:
1. Pick up all the waypoint scrolls as you explore each new area. There is a list of all of them sorted by ACT in the journal.
2. Do the quests in order.
3. Read the quest information and journal entry for each quest.
4. Follow the quest instructions.
5. Seek out a party with players of a similar level. The amount of experience/kill will not be as good but team work and survival will make it worthwhile. And you may learn a thing or two from your team mates.
6. Read the battle log and see what is going on, what happened, what worked, what did not.

Things you SHOULD NOT DO:
1. Beg for gear or gold.
2. Attack NPC's in Rogue Camp or the other towns.
3. Shout a lot of questions or comments, no one wants to hear it, trust me.
If you are stuck and you have followed the instructions above, use the tell chat channel and ask someone your question directly, you are more likely to get an answer that way. If you have not read the basic information and followed instructions, don't expect a friendly reply.
4. Try to kill, spell harass, pick pocket, disarm, or otherwise be unfriendly to other players. If you want to play player vs. player get consent from the other player first. Otherwise go somewhere else. You have lots of choices for this kind of predatory playing on other servers, Henk's World Of Sanctuary is not the place for it.
5. Try to steal the drop from another player. The monster spawner/killer gets the right to take the drop. Stay away from the remains if you did not spawn it and kill it.

Good Luck, 
have fun and good hunting.

p.s. Monster points are just a way to keep score, the information is listed on the Player Scoreboard for all players if you are interested.
Welcome to the World of Sanctuary (Readme)

Welcome to the World of Sanctuary

When you enter the game for the first time, READ ALL the entries in your journal. Then proceed to the NPC named Guide to Diablo Lord of Destruction. Read the background information but more importantly read the information about the waypoint system. THIS IS CRUCIAL !
Next proceed to the NPC Akara and talk to her, she will get you started on the first quest.

Things you SHOULD DO:
1. Pick up all the waypoint scrolls as you explore each new area. There is a list of all of them sorted by ACT in the journal.
2. Do the quests in order.
3. Read the quest information and journal entry for each quest.
4. Follow the quest instructions.
5. Seek out a party with players of a similar level. The amount of experience/kill will not be as good but team work and survival will make it worthwhile. And you may learn a thing or two from your team mates.
6. Read the battle log and see what is going on, what happened, what worked, what did not.

Things you SHOULD NOT DO:
1. Beg for gear or gold.
2. Attack NPC's in Rogue Camp or the other towns.
3. Shout a lot of questions or comments, no one wants to hear it, trust me.
If you are stuck and you have followed the instructions above, use the tell chat channel and ask someone your question directly, you are more likely to get an answer that way. If you have not read the basic information and followed instructions, don't expect a friendly reply.
4. Try to kill, spell harass, pick pocket, disarm, or otherwise be unfriendly to other players. If you want to play player vs. player get consent from the other player first. Otherwise go somewhere else. You have lots of choices for this kind of predatory playing on other servers, Henk's World Of Sanctuary is not the place for it.
5. Try to steal the drop from another player. The monster spawner/killer gets the right to take the drop. Stay away from the remains if you did not spawn it and kill it.

Welcome to the World of Sanctuary (Readme)

The Rogue Encampment Irregulars team of DMs, NWN mod creators, and NWN Players invite you to join & enjoy this module that we all played and grew to love over the years.

We plan to keep this module alive, enhance the player experience, and show it to new generations of players!

More to come!

Items of historic note regarding this module

NOTES CRIBBED FROM: https://neverwintervault.org/project/nwn1/module/gameworld/world-sanctuary-diablo-ii-lord-destruction

Title         	World of Sanctuary (Diablo II Lord Of Destruction)
Author  	Henk Blanken
Submitted / Updated  	08-13-2007 / 07-09-2015
Category  	Persistent Worlds
Expansions  	Requires Both Expansions (SoU & HotU)
Setting  	The World Of Sanctuary of the Diablo series
Language  	English
Tricks & Traps  	Light
Roleplay		Light / Non-existent
Hack & Slash  	Heavy
Classes  		All
Scope  		Large
DMNeeded  	Occasional DM Needed
Single or Multiplayer	either, though Acts 6+ are very hard solo
Max Character Level	40
Max # Players  		40
Min # Players  		01
Min Character Level 	01
Content Rating  	Everyone (some mature content if you seek it out)
Description
World of Sanctuary is a Neverwinter Nights module based on Blizzard's Diablo II: Lord of Destruction game made by Henk Blanken. Henk shut down the server after 10 years of operation, from 2004 to 2014. When asked why he replied: "Everything ends eventually". Stefano Dobbin curated the module for some time, but announced in 2021 that he would no longer be able to work on it. An ad-hoc group of Henk's former players, contributors, & NWN players came together to give continuity to Henk's module and keep on making this awesome world that WoS is grow and hopefully fulfill Henk's Legacy.

----- Henk's Description -----

World Of Sanctuary is a NeverWinter Nights PW or Persistent World. It is running 24 hours a day, 7 days a week with constant updates to both the world structure and scripting. It is a rich and vibrant world that you can get lost in and immerse yourself fully into it. Our goal is to give you a world that you can truly lose yourself in and become part of the world itself and not just seeing what the next thing to kill is. We believe that when you play your character that you should be able to be that character, leaving the outside world behind you and just being able to enjoy yourself. Isn't it one of the many reasons for playing on a RP server? Our module is based on the Diablo II - Lord of Destruction game from Blizzard. This copy of Blizzard's Diablo II contains Act I to V but the story goes on when Act V is finished and Baal is defeated. Our module tells the story from the original Diablo game and beyond. After Act V the story continues in six more Acts. We use players contributions and existing stories that we found on the internet. Ever wondered about the stories leading to the Diablo III story ? This story begins twenty years later after Baal is defeated and the Sanctuary was saved. We have a story made for you to fill in the gap between the two original games. World of Sanctuary is built by Diablo fans for Diablo fans all over the world, to come to gather and have fun, not only our community is playing on the Neverwinter Nights server but we play the real thing also on the battle.net servers from Blizzard. So have a look around and join our community.

-------------------------------

Server Information

==================

~400 Areas

~800 Custom Creatures

~2000 Custom Items

==================

Updated: 16/06/2021
Historic Notes about World of Sanctuary
